subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Why does 1 digital recorder capture EVP over another
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_010D_01C9F4AA.2CE9B060
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="Windows-1252"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

It means that he caught evidence of paranormal phenomena, and that is good =
enough for me.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: threadsintyme@juno.=
com 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, June 24, 2009 8:51 A=
M
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Why does 1 digital recorder capture EVP over ano=
ther





  But does this all mean? It doesn't answer the question of what =
or who made the EVP in the first place. But that calls for a bit of a jump =
in logic...unless we have studied natural Law, that is.
  Al
  ---------- O=
riginal Message ----------
  From: "April Abercrombie" <april@abercrombiegh=
ostresearch.com>
  To: <EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com>
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] W=
hy does 1 digital recorder capture EVP over another
  Date: Wed, 24 Jun 200=
9 08:45:03 -0600




  It goes without saying that if everything is as he s=
ays, then it is pretty good evidence.

  Paranormal means beyond normal. It=
 means it can't be explain by normal means.

    ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
    From: threadsintyme@... 
    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
    =
Sent: Wednesday, June 24, 2009 8:38 AM
    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Why does =
1 digital recorder capture EVP over another



    Sounds like you are jump=
ing the gun a bit, April...all we know is what Zack has told us. :) Zack, I=
 am not saying that you are being untruthful in any respect. What if Zack i=
s incorrect?

    So, given your point that he has indeed captured somethin=
g "paranormal" in nature...just what does that mean? How do we interpret th=
at "evidence"? 
    Al
    ---------- Original Message ----------
    From:=
 "April Abercrombie" <april@...>
    To: <EVP-ITC@=
yahoogroups.com>
    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Why does 1 digital recorder cap=
ture EVP over another
    Date: Wed, 24 Jun 2009 08:17:46 -0600




    Evi=
dence that his EVP was a True EVP. Evidence that he indeed captured somethi=
ng paranormal in nature.

      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: t=
hreadsintyme@... 
      To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
      Sent: Wedne=
sday, June 24, 2009 8:13 AM
      Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Why does 1 digital=
 recorder capture EVP over another


      Evidence of what? 
      Al
    =
  ---------- Original Message ----------
      From: "April Abercrombie" <a=
pril@...>
      To: <EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com>
    =
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Why does 1 digital recorder capture EVP over anoth=
er
      Date: Wed, 24 Jun 2009 07:50:03 -0600




      I would call that =
pretty good evidence right there.

        ----- Original Message ----- 
  =
      From: Zack Widup 
        To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: =
Wednesday, June 24, 2009 7:46 AM
        Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Why does 1 =
digital recorder capture EVP over another



        Interesting topic!

  =
      BTW that investigation was at the former Manteno State Mental Hospita=
l. It included the amazing "It's Harold Wing" EVP I got. None of the people=
 doing the investigation there had ever heard of Harold Wing. Upon later ex=
amination of old records, it was found that Harold Wing was actually a pati=
ent who died there of typhoid fever in 1938. But we didn't find that out un=
til weeks later.

        How do you explain that conventionally?
        :=
-)

        Zack

         
        On Wed, Jun 24, 2009 at 8:36 AM, April =
Abercrombie <april@...> wrote:





          A si=
milar thing happened to me on our last investigation too.

            ----=
- Original Message ----- 
            From: Zack Widup 
            To: EVP=
-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
            Sent: Wednesday, June 24, 2009 7:19 AM
  =
          Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Why does 1 digital recorder capture EVP ov=
er another



            There's another possibility: possibly the spirits=
 involved only wish to impart sounds to a particular unit or units.

      =
      I was surprised on one investigation I was on to get mostly all the s=
ame EVP on my DVR, which was hanging from my belt, and my camcorder, which =
was in front of my face. Other people on the investigation didn't get them =
at all. Go figure! 
            :-)

            Zack


            On Tue,=
 Jun 23, 2009 at 3:26 PM, Rj <rasterer@...> wrote:




              =
      There could be several reasons, and it's only conjecture without comp=
aring the two specific units in questions.  But some ideas:

              =
      1) The battery level on one is different than the other, and causing =
one to function less optimally and introduce noise or artifacts into the st=
ream.
                    2) They were not actually 'sitting' side by side,=
 but being swung around.
                    3) They are pointed at differe=
nt areas
                    4) One may be older than the other or have bee=
n dropped a few times.
                    5) One may have been recently ex=
posed to extreme humidity or temperatures, while the other remained in a co=
mfortable environment, before doing this recording
                    6) O=
ne may be sitting in a position more subject by airflow or vibrations
     =
               7) They may use different memory cards. that have different =
error or accuracy profiles
                    8) The final sound files may=
 have been processed differently in various software programs
             =
       9) People in the room may be nearer and moving closer to one than th=
e other
                    10) They may simply be two different models wit=
h different recording sensitives and limitations



                    ---=
 On Tue, 6/23/09, lechevar2000 <lechevar@...> wrote:


            =
          From: lechevar2000 <lechevar@...>
                      S=
ubject: [EVP-ITC] Why does 1 digital recorder capture EVP over another
    =
                  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
                      Date: T=
uesday, June 23, 2009, 5:57 AM 



                      Hi, 
             =
         I believe I saw an explaination on this list about why if you have=
 2 recorders sitting side by side, why may one capture an EVP on one and no=
t the other? Someone was explaining about an energy field like a bubble. 
 =
                     I'm trying to explain this theory to a friend. Can som=
eone help me? 
                      Thanks Laura


                   



=
